get.summary: EMS / Event / EMS / Event / Event List
get.description:
Returns event list:

- All active events
- Against a criteria passed
- List of events for an EO

parameters.name: eo
parameters.description: OPTIONAL - If passed, API will return only those events where the employee is EO

parameters.name: eventtype
parameters.description: OPTIONAL: Possible values are: Official, Community

200.description: EMS / Event / EMS / Event / 200 - My Event List

400.description: EMS / Event / EMS / Event / 400 - My Event List

401.description: EMS / Event / EMS / Event / 401 - My Event List
